doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Arpico Finance Pvt Limited Vs Abeydora Arachchilage Chandani and others before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Arpico Finance Pvt Limited Vs Abeydora Arachchilage Chandani and others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Possession of a vehicle in issue in the interim on a bond – Growing concern regarding the increasing number of frivolous applications – Safeguarding the judiciary from being bogged down by unsubstantial claims
